Agencies

**National Archives and Records Administration** (NARA) The mission of NARA is to provide public access to Federal Government records in our custody and control. Public access to government records strengthens democracy by allowing Americans to claim their rights of citizenship, hold their government accountable, and understand their history so they can participate more effectively in their government.

**Department of State (DOS)** The mission of State Department is to create a more secure, democratic, and prosperous world for the benefit of the American people and the international community.
